argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mat0dim.a | |- A = ( (/) Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_0fin | |- (/) e. Fin |
| 3 | 1 | #P_matring | |- ( ( (/) e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mpan | |- ( R e. Ring -> A e. Ring ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` A ) = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( A e. Ring -> ( 1r ` A ) e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 1r ` A ) e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` ( (/) Mat R ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_mat0dimbas0 | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( Base ` ( (/) Mat R ) ) = { (/) } ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( Base ` A ) = { (/) } ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( 1r ` A ) e. ( Base ` A ) <-> ( 1r ` A ) e. { (/) } ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_elsni | |- ( ( 1r ` A ) e. { (/) } -> ( 1r ` A ) = (/) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl6bi | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( 1r ` A ) e. ( Base ` A ) -> ( 1r ` A ) = (/) ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 14 | #P_mpd | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 1r ` A ) = (/) ) |
